title: Unified Payment Message Schema
description: Unified JSON schema for all ISO 20022 PACS and CAMT payment messages (pacs.008, pacs.003, pacs.007, camt.056, pacs.002, camt.029)

originalGroupInformation.description: Original group information for cancellation/reversal messages

caseAssignment.description: Case assignment information for investigation resolution (CAMT.029)

creationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the message was created

authorisation.description: User identification or any user key to be used to check whether the initiating party is allowed to initiate transactions

batchBooking.description: Identifies whether the financial institution is to book the transaction on a batch or individual basis

numberOfTransactions.description: Number of individual transactions contained in the message

controlSum.description: Total of all individual amounts included in the message

totalInterbankSettlementAmount.description: Total amount of money moved between the instructing agent and the instructed agent

interbankSettlementDate.description: Date on which the amount of money ceases to be available to the agent that owes it

groupReversal.description: Indicates whether the reversal applies to the complete group or to individual transactions within the group

interbankSettlementAmount.description: Amount of money moved between the instructing agent and the instructed agent

interbankSettlementDate.description: Date on which the amount of money ceases to be available

settlementPriority.description: Indicator of the urgency or order of importance that the instructing party would like the instructed party to apply

instructedAmount.description: Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor

exchangeRate.description: Factor used to convert an amount from one currency into another

chargeBearer.description: Specifies which party/parties will bear the charges associated with the processing of the payment transaction

chargesInformation.description: Provides information on the charges to be paid by the charge bearer

requiredExecutionDate.description: Date at which the initiating party requests the clearing agent to process the payment

requiredCollectionDate.description: Date and time at which the creditor requests that the amount of money is to be collected from the debtor

regulatoryReporting.description: Information needed due to regulatory and statutory requirements

relatedRemittanceInformation.description: Information that enables the matching of an entry with the items that the remittance information is for

cancellationId.description: Unique identification assigned by the cancelling party to unambiguously identify the cancellation request

reversalId.description: Unique identification assigned by the reversing party to unambiguously identify the reversal

cancellationReasonInformation.description: Set of elements used to provide detailed information on the cancellation reason

reversalReasonInformation.description: Set of elements used to provide detailed information on the reversal reason

originalInstructionId.description: Unique identification assigned by the instructing party to unambiguously identify the original instruction

originalEndToEndId.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the original transaction

originalTransactionId.description: Unique identification assigned by the first instructing agent to unambiguously identify the original transaction

originalUETR.description: Universally unique identifier to provide an end-to-end reference of a payment transaction

originalClearingSystemReference.description: Unique reference assigned by the clearing system to unambiguously identify the original transaction

originalInterbankSettlementAmount.description: Amount of money moved between the instructing agent and the instructed agent in the original transaction

originalInterbankSettlementDate.description: Date on which the amount of money ceased to be available to the agent that owed it in the original transaction

reversedInstructedAmount.description: Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor in the reversal

compensationAmount.description: Amount of money asked or paid as compensation for the processing of the instruction

supplementaryData.description: Additional information that cannot be captured in the structured elements

instructionId.description: Unique identification assigned by the instructing party to unambiguously identify the instruction

endToEndId.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction

transactionId.description: Unique identification assigned by the first instructing agent to unambiguously identify the transaction

UETR.description: Universally unique identifier to provide an end-to-end reference of a payment transaction

clearingSystemReference.description: Unique reference assigned by the clearing system to unambiguously identify the transaction

instructionPriority.description: Indicator of the urgency or order of importance that the instructing party would like the instructed party to apply

clearingChannel.description: Clearing channel to be used to process the payment instruction

serviceLevel.description: Agreement under which or rules under which the transaction should be processed

currency.description: Currency code as defined by ISO 4217

name.description: Name by which a party is known

countryOfResidence.description: Country in which a person resides

name.description: Name by which the financial institution is known

careOf.description: Name of a referent appointed by the receiver to take delivery of the mail

department.description: Identification of a subdivision of an organisation

subDepartment.description: Identification of a sub-division of a department

streetName.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare

buildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street

buildingName.description: Name of the building or house

floor.description: Floor or storey within a building

unitNumber.description: Number that identifies the unit within a building

postBox.description: Numbered box in a post office assigned to a person or organization

postCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address

townLocationName.description: Specific location name within a town

districtName.description: Identifies a subdivision within a country

countrySubDivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country

addressLine.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address

preNotificationId.description: Reference of the pre-notification which was sent separately

preNotificationDate.description: Date on which the pre-notification was sent

mandateId.description: Unique identification assigned by the creditor to refer to the mandate

dateOfSignature.description: Date on which the mandate was signed by the debtor

amendmentIndicator.description: Indicates whether the underlying mandate is amended or not

firstCollectionDate.description: Date of the first collection of a direct debit

finalCollectionDate.description: Date of the final collection of a direct debit

trackingDays.description: Number of days period during which the mandate is tracked

unstructured.description: Information supplied to enable the matching of an entry with the items that the transfer is intended to settle

structured.description: Information supplied to enable the matching of an entry with the items that the transfer is intended to settle

originalMessageId.description: Point to point reference assigned by the original instructing party to unambiguously identify the original message

originalMessageNameId.description: Specifies the original message name identifier to which the message refers

originalCreationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the original message was created

reversalReasonInformation.description: Set of elements used to provide detailed information on the reversal reason

id.description: Unique identification assigned by the case creator to unambiguously identify the case

creator.description: Party that created the investigation case

reopenCaseIndication.description: Indicates whether the case is new or reopened

numberOfTransactions.description: Number of individual transactions contained in the message

controlSum.description: Total of all individual amounts included in the message

settlementMethod.description: Method used to settle the (batch of) payment instructions

additionalInformation.description: Further details on the cancellation reason
Further details on the reversal reason

debitDateTime.description: Date and time at which the debtor agent books the transaction to the debtor's account

creditDateTime.description: Date and time at which the creditor agent books the transaction to the creditor's account

placeAndName.description: Unique identification that permits the retrieval of the extension information

envelope.description: Technical wrapper that allows extending the message with non-standard business information

id.description: Unique identification for the case assignment

assignee.description: Party to which the investigation case is assigned

creationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the assignment was created

reopenCaseIndication.description: Indicates whether the case should be reopened
